pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Brightway2 parametersLibrary for storing, validating, and calculating with parameters. Designed to work with the [Brightway2 life cycle assessment framework](https://brightwaylca.org), but is generic enough to work in other use cases. In [1]: from bw2parameters import ParameterSet In [2]: parameters = { ...: 'Deep_Thought': {'amount': 42}, ...: 'East_River_Creature': {'formula': '2 * Deep_Thought + 16'}, ...: 'Elders_of_Krikkit': {'formula': 'sqrt(East_River_Creature)'}, ...: } In [3]: ParameterSet(parameters).evaluate() Out[3]: {'Deep_Thought': 42, 'East_River_Creature': 100, 'Elders_of_Krikkit': 10.0}Compatible with Python 2.7 and 3.3+. 100% test coverage. [Source code on Github](https://github.com/brightway-lca/brightway2-parameters), documentation on [Read the Docs](https://brightway2-parameters.readthedocs.io/).
